affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.
notes:
The projectile moves very slowly (500 ms), providing 325 vision around it. Upon impact, it will reveal the target area for 3.34 seconds.
Arcane Bolt cannot be disjointed.
cmb:
70/70/70/70
5/4/3/2
lore: Within the Ghastly Eyrie's endless intrigue, only the clever and calm can hope to survive.
name: skywrath_mage_arcane_bolt

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.
notes:
Does not work when no heroes are in range or heroes are in fog.
Damages creeps around the impact area.
Provides 400 vision around the projectile, and reveals the target area for 3.34 seconds upon impact.
cmb:
110/110/110/110
20/18/16/14
lore: Those who serve the court of the Ghastly Eyrie are ever locked in covert war. One must always know where danger lurks nearest.
name: skywrath_mage_concussive_shot

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.
notes: The magic damage resistance reduction doesn't affect creeps.
cmb:
80/90/100/110
14
lore: A holy incantation, whosoever finds themselves touched by Avilliva's sigil must suffer in penitent silence.
name: skywrath_mage_ancient_seal

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.4 seconds.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Mystic Flare only affects Heroes; it does not damage illusions or creep heroes.
cmb:
350/575/800
60/40/20
lore: Only the most practiced of Skywrath sorcerers could hope to shape the skies into such a storm.
name: skywrath_mage_mystic_flare
